select * from ms_board order by bid desc
mapper.update: update ms_board set bname=#{bname}, btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} where bid =#{bid}
mapper.insert: insert into ms_board (bid, bname, btitle, bcontent, bgroup, bstep, bindent, selecter) values (ms_board_seq.nextval, #{bname}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, ms_board_seq.currval, 0, 0, ${selecter})
mapper.update: update ms_board set bstep = bstep + 1 where bgroup =#{bgroup} and bstep > #{bstep}
mapper.insert: insert into ms_board (bid, bname, btitle, bcontent, bgroup, bstep, bindent, selecter) values (ms_board_seq.nextval, #{bname}, #{btitle},#{bcontent}, #{bgroup}, #{bstep}+1, #{bindent}+1, #{selecter})
